feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Winter Storm Warning issued November 13 at 6:26AM AKST until November 13 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow occurring. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 9 inches with up to 12 inches on the Anchorage and Eagle River Hillsides. Areas of blowing snow. * WHERE...Anchorage. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Today.

entry.summary: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 314, 315, AND 317... .Unseasonably warm temperatures are expected today with highs from 60-65 degrees. Minimum relative humidity will drop to 13 to 15 percent. Southwest winds will increase to 15 to 25 mph this
